import React from 'react' import { Button,Modal, Box, FormControl,InputLabel, OutlinedInput, Checkbox } from '@mui/material'; import { StarBorder, Star } from '@mui/icons-material'; function ContactForm({onSubmit,onCancel,handleClose,open}) { const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: 200, bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '2px solid #000', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, '& .MuiTextField-root': { m: 1, width: '25ch' } }; return(
} checkedIcon={} checked={true} /> First Name Last Name Email Address Mobile Number
); } export default ContactForm;
